sect2.title: Syntax
sect2.synopsis:
<!ELEMENT search_replace (file, find, replace)>
<!ATTLIST configure base CDATA #IMPLIED>
sect2.para: This element occurs in the elements alfs, else, stage. and then

sect2.title: Description
sect2.para: The element search_replace is used to perform a search and replace operation of a file.
The sub-element file contains the filename
The sub-element find contains the string to be searched
The sub-element replace contains the replacement string.

sect2.title: Examples
sect2.programlisting: echo Performing substitution in runit.sh cd /usr/src/mypackage cp runit.sh /tmp/foo.$$ sed -e 's/BINDIR/\/bin/' /tmp/foo.$$ > runit.sh
